# cmccloudv2_kubernetes_nodegroup (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_kubernetes_nodegroup" "nodegroup1" {
    cluster_id         = "ee396bfd-1815-4b7a-8570-1141e45b9044"
    name               = "nodegroup1"
    flavor_id          = "e8de899a-0847-492e-a33f-ef127c97393e"
    node_count         = 2
    min_node_count     = 2
    max_node_count     = 3
    billing_mode       = "hourly"
    docker_volume_size = 120
    docker_volume_type = "commonio"
    zone               = "AZ1"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String)
- `docker_volume_size` (Number)
- `docker_volume_type` (String)
- `flavor_id` (String)
- `max_node_count` (Number)
- `min_node_count` (Number)
- `name` (String) Name of node group, this can't be changed after created
- `node_count` (Number)
- `zone` (String)

### Optional

- `billing_mode` (String)
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
